explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of data mining methods, specifically clustering and classification, which are core techniques in machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper uses classification methods like logistic regression and C4.5 decision tree, which are supervised learning techniques.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper employs k-means clustering, an unsupervised learning method, as a pre-classification step.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on building a classification model to predict financial distress, using logistic regression and C4.5 decision tree.
explanations.decision tree: The paper specifically mentions the use of C4.5 decision tree as part of the hybrid classifier.
explanations.clustering: The paper uses k-means clustering to pre-classify data into clusters before applying classification methods.
